mapper.insert: INSERT INTO srtp_dot (id, shelves, x, y) VALUES (#{id}, #{shelves}, #{x}, #{y})
INSERT INTO srtp_dotdis (m1, n1, m2, n2, dis) VALUES (#{m1}, #{n1}, #{m2}, #{n2}, #{dis})
INSERT INTO srtp_shelvesdis (x1, y1, x2, y2, s1, s2, g1, g2, num1, num2, score1, score2) VALUES (#{x1}, #{y1}, #{x2}, #{y2}, #{s1}, #{s2}, #{g1}, #{g2}, #{num1}, #{num2}, #{score1}, #{score2})
